                "img:nth-of-type(1) {\n  shape-outside: circle(80px at 50% 50%);\n  float: left;\n  width: 200px;\n}\nimg:nth-of-type(2) {\n  shape-outside: circle(80px at 50% 50%);\n  float: right;\n  width: 200px;  \n}\np {\n  text-align: center;\n  line-height: 30px; /* purely for demo */\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },

          "version": 1
        }
